title: New: Evil Arrows – Romancer
content:
Perfectly formed upbeat pop, it just has to be from Brooklyn, right? Evil Arrows appear effortlessly cool on their debut track Romancer, a two and a half minute, no frills attached, straight up indie-pop gem.

I’m can’t find too much info on the group at the moment, with only a Facebook page with two ‘likes’ and a deserted Twitter profile to their name, but on the strength of Romancer, it’s only a matter of time before they’re gaining more coverage.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
